original_query: SELECT MIN(t.Id) FROM tags as t, posts as p, users as u, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = t.ExcerptPostId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM tags AS tags
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5E3.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E3E4 WHERE E1.ExcerptPostId=E2E5E3E4.Id)
